DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational follow-up study on the efficacy of 1st-line treatment with Herceptin (trastuzumab) in patients with metastatic breast cancer 7 years after initiation of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Follow-up Study of 1st-Line Treatment With Herceptin (Trastuzumab) in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer (Post-HERMINE)
DOC.criteria: Female patient, >/= 18 years of age Metastatic breast cancer 1stline treatment with Herceptin initiated in 2002 Included in pharmacoepidemiologic HERMINE study Patient died before scheduled followup visit (March 2005)
